Item.Value: [Text:Hi, I'm $Character_25$, it's nice to meet you. Nice town you have here. Could use some more plants though I think eh?][UnlockBuildingID:31]
[Text:I love plants, there's nothing more fascinating to me than watching them grow.][Default]
[Text:$Character_6$ is kind of scary, isn't she? She just has this look in her eyes... sometimes I'm afraid she's going to wilt my flowers just by looking at them!][Villager:6]
[Text:Really? For me! Oh my... yes. Yes! I'll marry you!]
[Text:I was worried it was just me. Yes, I would love to date you, $Name$]
[Text:Hello, Love. How are you this morning? I got up a bit early to water the plants.][Married]
